title: Episode 273 - You Got Sprayed With Bear Mace???
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer chat about why we shouldn't give money to other countries, their upcoming movie "The Janitor", Evan describes what it's like getting sprayed with bear mace, and Mat gets hit on by a gay stewardess. ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer chat about why we shouldn't give money to other countries, their upcoming movie "The Janitor", Evan describes what it's like getting sprayed with bear mace, and Mat gets hit on by a gay stewardess.

Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer chat about why we shouldn't give money to other countries, their upcoming movie "The Janitor", Evan describes what it's like getting sprayed with bear mace, and Mat gets hit on by a gay stewardess.
